metadata.title: CVE-2020-28017 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: Exim 4 before 4.94.2 allows Integer Overflow to Buffer Overflow in receive_add_recipient via an e-mail message with fifty million recipients. NOTE: remote exploitation may be difficult because of resource consumption.

criterions.comment: exim4 package in hirsute was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '4.94-15ubuntu1.2').
